page.title: 16Employment in Codford Area
page.content:
We did a survey of what the parents of the 23 children in the top class do for a living. Here are the results:
Mothers: 7 are housewives,4 work in offices,3 are cleaners, 2 are nursing and there are one each doing the following:bank clerk, barmaid, shop worker,clerk at the M.O.D, Technical Assistant at Kingdown school, a bookbinder,and one works at the Flying Goose Frozen Foods.
Fathers: 4 work on the farms, 5 are in the building trade, 3 are salesmen, 3 are craftsmen, 2 are in the army and 2 work for the M.O.D, 1 is a car mechanic, 1 works for the Wiltshire C.C., 1 works for the Flying Goose and 1 is a T.V mechanic.
